title: Interview / Portfolio
content:
Hello,

I have an interview coming up for a placement with a type designer.

Any advice on what to include in my portfolio / how to present it?

Also, what sort of questions will be asked?

Thanks

Tom

 [‹ Some nice hand lettering from a 1920 children's book](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123025420/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33818 "Go to previous forum topic") [help on tables ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081123025420/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33823 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tomhowe

comments.content: I might start by including things which demonstrate your ability with drawing tools. I’d also consider demonstrating abilities with programming, especially things such as Robofab.
umm...typefaces and layouts with type you’ve designed?
